Liverpool Sepertinya Akan Terus memainkan Lovren Beberapa Pekan ke Depan
01 Nov 2019, 22:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Liverpool Jurgen Klopp mengungkapkan bahwa Joel Matip masih akan absen untuk beberapa pekan ke depan dan sepertinya ia akan mengandalkan Dejan Lovren di lini pertahanan.
Matip adalah pasangan yang serasi bagi Virgil Van Dijk di lini pertahanan. Ia mampu mengambil alih pos bek tengah dari Joe Gomez sejak musim lalu.
Bek asal Kamerun itu sendiri tak cuma bagus dalam bertahan. Namun ia juga bisa membantu serangan timnya dengan penguasaan bolanya yang bagus.
Tak jarang ia kerap membawa bola hingga ke area depan kotak penalti dan membantu memecah pertahanan lawan. Namun sayangnya sekarang ini ia mengalami cedera lutut.
text:
Liverpool are likely to continue playing Lovren in the coming weeks
Nov 01 2019, 22:19 by Bola.net
Liverpool - Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp revealed that Joel Matip will still be absent for the next few weeks and it looks like he will rely on Dejan Lovren in defense.
Matip is a great match for Virgil Van Dijk in defense. He was able to take over the center back post from Joe Gomez since last season.
The Cameroon defender himself is not only good at defense. But he can also help his team attack with good control of the ball.
Not infrequently he often brings the ball up to the front area of the penalty box and helps break down the opponent's defense. But unfortunately he is currently suffering from a knee injury.
